column1: #Text=The trial for two Swedish journalists being tried for terrorism in Ethiopia began yesterday .
#Text=The freelance journalists were arrested after entering from neighboring country Somalia without permission .
#Text=They allegedly aided a terrorist group and were wounded in a gunfight , in which 15 rebels were killed .

#Text=Ethiopian Prime Minister Meles Zenawi says the two imprisoned Swedish journalists " made their way into Ethiopia with a terrorist organization that had killed 70 people who worked for a mining company in an attack .
